description:
HandBrake 1.8.2 open-source video transcoder software is now available for download with various bug fixes for Linux and Windows systems, as well as updated components. Here's what's changed.

The post HandBrake 1.8.2 Video Transcoder Adds FFmpeg 7.0.2 Support and Fixes Bugs appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: HandBrake 1.8.2 Video Transcoder Adds FFmpeg 7.0.2 Support and Fixes Bugs
